title: Man who may have shot himself at Burbank hotel identified
content:
BURBANK >> The Los Angeles County Coroner’s Office Sunday released the name of a 34-year-old man who might have shot himself at a luxury hotel in Burbank.
He was Justin Malone of Burbank, said coroner’s Lt. Brian Kim.
Police responded at 11 p.m. Thursday to a call of shots fired at the Los Angeles Marriott Burbank Airport at 2500 N. Hollywood Way. Officers found a man’s body, and a gun was recovered at the scene, said Burbank police Sgt. John Pfrommer.
The man’s body was found in the valet area outside the hotel, said Burbank police Sgt. Claudio Losacco.
There were no outstanding suspects, Pfrommer said, adding that the shooting might have been a suicide.
Pfrommer said a convention was being held at the hotel but it wasn’t immediately clear whether the man was an attendee.
Burbank police asked anyone with information regarding the shooting to call them at (818) 238-3000.
